  • public class dateCheckerController
extends java.lang.Object
    Non-REST controller can take Date as input and gives whether the date is valid or not Returns boolean value - usable by all the controllers Try invalid Dates returns false If an Invalid Date is entered . Try : 2015-02-30 // Feb 30 is not in 2015
